thankYou.heading: Thank You for Your Submission!
thankYou.subheading: We've received your application and will be in touch soon!

footer.description: Efficient and reliable cleaning services tailored to your needs, keeping your home and office spotless in Jönköping.
footer.copyright: Copyright by PureClean Jönköping @ 2025. All rights reserved

aboutUs.subtitle: About Us
aboutUs.title: Your Trusted Cleaning Partner in Jönköping
aboutUs.description1: Based in Jönköping, we are committed to delivering top-notch cleaning services tailored to your needs.
aboutUs.description2: Our goal is to provide exceptional quality at a great price, ensuring your space is always spotless and welcoming.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description1: Have questions or need a personalized cleaning quote? Reach out to us today! We’re here to help you keep your space spotless and welcoming.
contactUs.description2: We speak English at the moment, but we’re learning Swedish. Feel free to reach out in English — we’ll respond quickly and happily!

hero.subtitle: Your Local Cleaning Experts
hero.description: Efficient and reliable cleaning services tailored to your needs, keeping your home and office spotless in Jönköping.

prices.title: Our Prices
prices.description: We offer competitive rates to fit your budget without compromising on quality.
prices.RUTinfo: We offer RUT deduction on all our home services! With RUT, you only pay 50% of the labor cost – we handle the paperwork directly with the Swedish Tax Agency. RUT applies to services like cleaning, gardening, and babysitting. Enjoy professional help at half the price! Contact us today to learn more.

services.title: House Cleaning
services.description: Keep your home spotless with tailored cleaning routines that fit your lifestyle and schedule.

services.title: Office Cleaning
services.description: Maintain a pristine work environment with efficient, reliable cleaning for offices and commercial spaces.

services.title: Deep Cleaning
services.description: Thorough top-to-bottom cleaning to refresh your space, including hard-to-reach areas and detailed care.

services.title: Move-In/Move-Out Cleaning
services.description: Leave your old place spotless or your new one move-in ready with our detailed cleaning service.

team.subtitle: OUR TEAM
team.title: This is a family business
team.description: We are a couple living in Jönköping, running a small family business with dedication and passion. Our mission is to provide quality cleaning services with a personal touch, ensuring every space we clean feels like home.

testimonialsInner.name: Håkan Lindström
testimonialsInner.description: Exceptional cleaning service! Always punctual, thorough, and attentive to details. Our home has never looked better.

testimonialsInner.name: Fatima Khalil
testimonialsInner.description: Super reliable and professional. They truly care about making your home feel fresh and welcoming. Highly recommend!

testimonialsInner.name: Nils Sandberg
testimonialsInner.description: Great service at an affordable price. Always impressed with the quality and consistency of their work.

callbackform.errorDescription: Please try again later or contact us directly.

quote.heading: Thank you!
quote.subheading: We will reach out to you soon!
